gif


data and functions for gif manipulation


GifPalette

typedef struct {
  ColorRGB colors[256];
  uint8    bit_depth;
  uint8    transparency_index;
} GifPalette;
type: C struct

GifHeader

typedef struct {
  // header
  uint8  signature[3];
  uint8  version[3];
  // logical screen descriptor
  uint16 screen_width;
  uint16 screen_height;
  uint8  packed;
  uint8  background_color;
  uint8  aspect_ratio;
} GifHeader;
type: C struct

GifGraphicsControlExtension

typedef struct {
  uint8  introducer;
  uint8  label;
  uint8  block_size;
  uint8  packed;
  uint16 delay;
  uint8  color_index;
  uint8  terminator;
} GifGraphicsControlExtension;
type: C struct

GifImageDescriptor

typedef struct {
  uint8  separator;
  uint16 left;
  uint16 top;
  uint16 width;
  uint16 height;
  uint8  packed;
} GifImageDescriptor;
type: C struct

GifApplicationExtension

typedef struct {
  uint8  introducer;
  uint8  label;
  uint8  block_size;
  char   identifier[8];
  uint8  authent_code[3];
  uint8 *application_data; // pointer to sub-blocks
  uint8  terminator;
} GifApplicationExtension;
type: C struct

GifNetscapeExtensionData

typedef struct {
  uint8  sub_block_size;
  uint8  reserved;
  uint16 repeat; // lo-hi
} GifNetscapeExtensionData;
type: C struct

GifPlainTextExtension

typedef struct {
  uint8  introducer;
  uint8  label;
  uint8  block_size;
  uint16 text_grid_left;
  uint16 text_grid_top;
  uint16 text_grid_width;
  uint16 text_grid_height;
  uint8  cell_width;
  uint8  cell_height;
  uint8  text_fg_color_index;
  uint8  text_bg_color_index;
  uint8 *plain_text_data; // pointer to sub-blocks
  uint8  terminator;
} GifPlainTextExtension;
type: C struct

GifCommentExtension

typedef struct {
  uint8  introducer;
  uint8  label;
  uint8 *comment_data; // pointer to sub-blocks
  uint8  terminator;
} GifCommentExtension;
type: C struct

GifBlockType

type: C enum
GIF_APPLICATION_EXTENSION
GIF_GRAPHICS_CONTROL_EXTENSION
GIF_COMMENT_EXTENSION
GIF_PLAIN_TEXT_EXTENSION
GIF_IMAGE_DESCRIPTOR
GIF_COUNT

GifSubBlock

typedef struct {
  uint8  data[256];
  uint8  size;
} GifSubBlock;
type: C struct

GifBlock

typedef struct {
  GifBlockType                  type;
  union BlockData
  {
    GifApplicationExtension     application_extension;
    GifGraphicsControlExtension graphis_control_extension;
    GifCommentExtension         comment_extension;
    GifPlainTextExtension       plain_text_extension;
    GifImageDescriptor          image_descriptor;
  } data;
  GifPalette                    lct;
  uint8                        *indices;
  GifSubBlock                  *sub_blocks;
} GifBlock;
type: C struct

GifFile

typedef struct {
  GifHeader  header;
  GifPalette gct;
  GifBlock  *blocks;
} GifFile;
type: C struct

GifDisposalMethod

type: C enum
GIF_DISPOSAL_UNSPECIFIED
GIF_DISPOSAL_NONE do not dispose
GIF_DISPOSAL_BACKGROUND overwrite with background color
GIF_DISPOSAL_PREVIOUS

Gif_ptr

typedef GifFile *Gif_ptr;
type: C typedef

i_gif_alloc

Gif_ptr i_gif_alloc();
type: C function

i_gif_clear

void    i_gif_clear(Gif_ptr gif);
type: C function

i_gif_free

void    i_gif_free(Gif_ptr gif);
type: C function

i_gif_read

bool i_gif_read(Gif_ptr gif, Stream *stream);
type: C function

i_gif_write

bool i_gif_write(const Gif_ptr gif, Stream *stream);
type: C function

i_gif_write_file

bool i_gif_write_file(const Gif_ptr gif, const char *path);
type: C function

i_gif_read_file

bool i_gif_read_file(Gif_ptr gif, const char *path);
type: C function

i_gif_begin

bool i_gif_begin(Gif_ptr gif, uint width, uint height, bool sort, const GifPalette *palette, uint8 background_color);
type: C function

i_gif_add_netscape_extension

bool i_gif_add_netscape_extension(Gif_ptr gif, uint32 repeat);
type: C function

i_gif_add_comment

bool i_gif_add_comment(Gif_ptr gif, const char *comment);
type: C function

i_gif_add_graphics_control

bool i_gif_add_graphics_control(Gif_ptr gif, uint16 delay, bool user_input, GifDisposalMethod disposal, bool transparency, uint8 transparency_index);
type: C function

i_gif_add_image_descriptor

bool i_gif_add_image_descriptor(Gif_ptr gif, uint32 left, uint32 top, uint32 width, uint32 height, const GifPalette *palette, const uint8 *indices, bool sort, bool interlace);
type: C function

i_gif_add_frame

bool i_gif_add_frame(Gif_ptr gif, const Image_ptr image, uint offset_x, uint offset_y, uint16 delay, bool dithering);
type: C function

bool i_gif_extract_frames(const Gif_ptr gif, Image_ptr **frames);
